when the server starts and before anyone joins thanks

item.title: Spaawn objects
item.dc:creator: @i_noob_iii i noob iii
item.description:
@i_noob_iii wrote:

[code]First, Search for
Code:

public void AddGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType)

if u cant find it search for

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {Then add this after the runnable statement.

[code]public void AddGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){
outStream.createFrame(85);
outStream.writeByteC(y - (mapRegionY * 8));
outStream.writeByteC(x - (mapRegionX * 8));

outStream.createFrame(151);
outStream.writeByteA(0);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(typeID);
outStream.writeByteS((tileObjectType<<2)+(orientation&3));
}[/code]

To add a object, search for case 121 and add
Code:

AddGlobalObject(absX, absY+1, 6045, 0, 0);[/code]

Read full topic
